sections.text:
HISTORY: Former Section 34-43-10, titled Citation of Act, had the following history: 2000 Act No. 314, Section 1, eff May 30, 2000. Repealed by 2000 Act No. 314, Section 4, as last amended by 2019 Act No. 77, Section 3, eff June 30, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section 34-43-20, titled Definitions, had the following history: 2000 Act No. 314, Section 1, eff May 30, 2000. Repealed by 2000 Act No. 314, Section 4, as last amended by 2019 Act No. 77, Section 3, eff June 30, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section 34-43-30, titled Duties and responsibilities of department; authority to contract with entity to carry out; annual report, had the following history: 2000 Act No. 314, Section 1, eff May 30, 2000. Repealed by 2000 Act No. 314, Section 4, as last amended by 2019 Act No. 77, Section 3, eff June 30, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section 34-43-40, titled Certification as community development corporation and community development financial institution; application for and term, renewal, and revocation of certification; reports; notice and hearing; tax credit, had the following history: 2000 Act No. 314, Section 1, eff May 30, 2000. Repealed by 2000 Act No. 314, Section 4, as last amended by 2019 Act No. 77, Section 3, eff June 30, 2023.

HISTORY: Former Section 34-43-50, titled Grants and loans, had the following history: 2000 Act No. 314, Section 1, eff May 30, 2000. Repealed by 2000 Act No. 314, Section 4, as last amended by 2019 Act No. 77, Section 3, eff June 30, 2023.
